ACWN.DE.summary: A.S. CrÃ©ation Tapeten AG, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells wallpapers worldwide. It operates through two segments, Wallpaper and Furnishing Fabrics. The Wallpaper segment produces and markets wallpapers and borders. The Furnishing Fabrics segment markets curtains and furnishing fabrics. The company offers its wallpapers primarily under the innova, A.S. CrÃ©ation, livingwalls, and Architects Paper brand names; and decorative fabrics under the Indes and Fuggerhaus brand names. It also provides various services, such as departmental planning, shop-fitting, ordering, decoration, individual marketing concept, sales promotional package, and concepts for point-of-sale services, as well as delivery services. A.S. CrÃ©ation Tapeten AG was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Gummersbach, Germany.

VIB3.DE.summary: Villeroy & Boch AG, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells ceramic products primarily under the Villeroy & Boch brand worldwide. It operates through Bathroom and Wellness, and Tableware divisions. The Bathroom and Wellness division manufactures ceramic sanitary ware, ceramic kitchen sinks, bathroom furniture, bathtubs and shower tubs, whirlpools, bath and kitchen fittings, and accessories. It also provides shower toilets, installation systems, outdoor system pools and accessories, and others. The Tableware division offers tableware, crystal/glass and cutlery, and accessories, as well as kitchen and tableware textiles, and gift articles. The company sells its products through a network of approximately 100 Villeroy & Boch stores and 500 points of sale facilities at department stores, as well as through its online shops. It serves dealers, craftsmen, architects, interior designers, planners, small porcelain retailers, department store chains, e-commerce providers, investors, office buildings, hotels, and residential complexes, as well as operators of hotels and restaurants. The company was founded in 1748 and is headquartered in Mettlach, Germany.

WEW.DE.summary: Westwing Group AG engages in the home and living e-commerce business. The company operates through two segments, DACH and International. It offers textile products, rugs, furniture products, decoration items, lighting products, kitchen products, and dining products. The company provides its products under own and private label, and third-party brands. It has operations in 11 European countries, including Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, the Czech Republic, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain, and Slovakia. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

WUG.F.summary: Westag & Getalit AG engages in the manufacture of wooden products for interior finishing and building construction. It offers wooden interior doors, door frames, kitchen worktops, window sills, laminates, direct coatings, coated plywood panels, solid surface materials, industrial panels, and vehicle panels. The company distributes its products worldwide. Westag & Getalit AG was founded in 1901 and is headquartered in Rheda-WiedenbrÃ¼ck, Germany. As of August 21, 2018, Westag & Getalit AG operates as a subsidiary of Broadview Industries AG.
